## Bio

My research interests are in pharmacotherapy, pharmacogenomics, and pharmacometrics.

I earned my Doctoral of Pharmacy in 2017 from [the University of Minnesota-Duluth](https://www.pharmacy.umn.edu/about/our-campuses/duluth) and Ph.D. in Experimental and Clinical Pharmacology at the University of Minnesota in the [Department of Experimental and Clinical Pharmacology, College of Pharmacy](https://www.pharmacy.umn.edu/departments/experimental-and-clinical-pharmacology). I am also a licensed Pharmacist in Minnesota.
